sources.title: Unsolved Mysteries: The Sleepwalker Killing | FULL MOVIE | Murder Mystery
sources.description:
Can a sleepwalker commit murder? Mark Schall admits to murdering his mother-in-law. In his defense, his wife (Hilary Swank) and a team of lawyers attempt to prove that while Mark did commit murder, he was not awake when it happened.

sources.title: Unsolved Mysteries: The Sleepwalker Killing | FULL MOVIE | Murder Mystery
sources.description:
Can a sleepwalker commit murder? Mark Schall admits to murdering his mother-in-law. In his defense, his wife (Hilary Swank) and a team of lawyers attempt to prove that while Mark did commit murder, he was not awake when it happened.

#tvmovie #movie #thriller #freemoviesonline #crime #murdermystery #horrorstories #sleepwalker

metadata.Plot: Mark Schall kills his mother-in-law and wounds his father-in-law in the middle of the night, then turns himself in. He claims, however, that he cannot remember the crime itself. His defense team finds evidence that suggests the crimes were committed while Mark was sleep walking. They build their defense around this theory.
metadata.Actors: Hilary Swank, Jeffrey Nordling, Charles Esten
